title: Time per day spent on leisure activities in OECD countries by gender , as of 2016
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Male, and Female. The y axis indicates the Average minutes per day and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Male is gradually increasing, Female is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Average minutes per day in descending order is: 1. Male, and lastly, 2. Female.
Throughout the period, Male generally had the highest Average minutes per day relative to others with an average of 315.69, and it reached its maximum at Finland_(2009-10) with a value of 386.0.
The botommost line, Female,  has a mean of 275.34, and peaked at Norway_(2010).

Overall Male is gradually increasing, Female is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Male, and lastly, 2. Female.
Overall across the Year, Male mostly maintained the highest Average minutes per day when compared to others with a mean value of 315.69, and it peaked at Finland_(2009-10).
The botommost line, Female,  has a mean of 275.34, and peaked at Norway_(2010).
The difference of Average minutes per day between Male and Female is greater at Year United_States_(2014) compared to the Year Australia_(2006).
